doc.field: Includes group shots with HRL and his son Henry Luce III; HRL talking to individuals; men on horses with cows; HRL with other men looking over a wooden fence; HRL with L. R. Hagy and Gene Howe; group shot with Henry Luce III holding a gun; an original signed letter dated 1967 from J. Russell Wait with attached photos; photos of boats and industrial machinery; HRL reading inside a train compartment? while Henry Luce III is looking over a map; Elliath and Ruth Roosevelt sitting on a horse at the Shady Oak Farm; a group of women doing the can-can; HRL and another man pointing pistols up in the air; and HRL with Henry Luce III on horses holding up their hats. Also includes a small paper album with HRL on port boat with Texas Counsel Simmons, with Democratic Committeeman Wright Morrow, and a group shot in front of the San Jacinto Monument.
Series IX. Photographs >> Texas Trip 1940 (2 folders)
